headline: Barclays Trims Target on Lennox, But Still Sees Structural Strength
summary: Lennox International Inc. (NYSE:LII) is one of the most profitable manufacturing stocks to buy now. On October 23, 2025, Barclays reiterated its “Overweight” rating on Lennox International but trimmed its 12‑month price target from $730 to $700, signaling a slight cooling in optimism. The note pointed out the company’s mixed Q3/2025 results: adjusted EPS came in at […]

headline: Lennox price target lowered to $560 from $610 at UBS
summary: UBS analyst Damian Karas lowered the firm’s price target on Lennox (LII) to $560 from $610 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm is lowering its estimates by 2%-3% as residential industry headwinds persist, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. headline: 1 Mid-Cap Stock with Competitive Advantages and 2 We Question
summary: Mid-cap stocks often strike the right balance between having proven business models and market opportunities that can support $100 billion corporations. However, they face intense competition from scaled industry giants and can be disrupted by new innovative players vying for a slice of the pie.
